member.name: T:iPAHeartBeat.Core.Singleton.Singleton`1
member.summary: Will provide basic singleton feature to any class which are derived from this one.
member.typeparam: The name of the class which needs to be marked as Singleton.

member.name: F:iPAHeartBeat.Core.Singleton.Singleton`1._locked
member.summary: Internal object to provide locking when creating instance of the object via Singleton Accessor Filed "Me".

member.name: F:iPAHeartBeat.Core.Singleton.Singleton`1._instance
member.summary: Internal static filed to use singleton instance.

member.name: M:iPAHeartBeat.Core.Singleton.Singleton`1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:iPAHeartBeat.Core.Singleton.Singleton`1.Me
member.summary: Gets or sets singleton Instance accessor property Me. WIll return a single copy of instance to use member's of the class without creating multiple instances.
